teammembers.name: Aakasmik Ghimire
teammembers.bio: Visionary leader with 15+ years in IT strategy and business transformation. Drives innovation and excellence across all operations.

teammembers.name: Kushal Poudel
teammembers.bio: Kushal Poudel is an emerging professional in the fields of IT and real estate, combining strong academic knowledge in computer networking and cybersecurity with practical business experience. Starting his journey as a real estate broker, he quickly expanded his ventures, founding Devalaya Infosys to deliver innovative IT solutions. His multidisciplinary background enables him to approach projects with strategic insight, blending technical expertise with market-driven thinking to build reliable, secure, and scalable systems.

teammembers.name: Apshana Sapkota
teammembers.bio: Experienced SEO lead specializing in technical SEO, content optimization, and data-driven strategies to boost organic growth and online visibility.

teammembers.name: Avash Shrestha
teammembers.bio: Skilled blue team cybersecurity engineer specializing in defensive security, threat monitoring, and incident response. Experienced in SIEM analysis, intrusion detection, and securing networks against evolving cyber threats.

teammembers.name: Janak Devkota
teammembers.bio: Proficient Next.js developer with expertise in building high-performance, SEO-friendly web applications. Skilled in React, server-side rendering, API integration, and creating scalable frontend architectures for seamless user experiences.

companystory.subtitle: Our Timeline
companystory.title: Our Journey
paragraphs: Founded with a vision to bridge the gap between technology and business success, DEVALAYA INFOSYS has been at the forefront of digital transformation for over a decade.
We combine deep technical expertise with business acumen to deliver solutions that not only meet today's needs but also prepare our clients for tomorrow's challenges.
From startups to enterprise clients, we've helped organizations across industries leverage technology to achieve their goals and drive sustainable growth.

projectshero.subtitle: Our Work
projectshero.title: Projects
projectshero.description: Explore our portfolio of innovative solutions that have helped businesses transform and grow

projects.title: HealthConnect Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive telemedicine platform connecting patients with healthcare providers through secure video consultations, appointment scheduling, and electronic health records management.

projects.title: FinTrack Analytics
projects.description: Advanced financial analytics platform with real-time data processing, predictive modeling, and interactive dashboards for investment insights and portfolio management.

projects.title: SmartRetail POS
projects.description: Modern point-of-sale system with inventory management, customer loyalty programs, and sales analytics designed for multi-location retail businesses.

projects.title: SecureVault
projects.description: Enterprise-grade security solution providing end-to-end encryption, threat detection, and compliance monitoring for sensitive data protection.

projects.title: EduLearn LMS
projects.description: Comprehensive learning management system with interactive course content, progress tracking, assessment tools, and virtual classroom capabilities.

projects.title: LogiTrack
projects.description: Real-time logistics and supply chain management platform with GPS tracking, route optimization, inventory management, and predictive analytics.

servicetestimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
servicetestimonials.testimonial: The web application Devalaya Infosys built for us has transformed our patient management process. Their attention to detail and technical expertise is outstanding.

servicetestimonials.name: Michael Chen
servicetestimonials.testimonial: Their mobile app development team delivered a solution that exceeded our expectations. Our customers love the new shopping experience.

servicetestimonials.name: Priya Patel
servicetestimonials.testimonial: The data analytics dashboard they created has given us insights we never had before. It's completely changed how we make business decisions.
